mergewith.fragment:
<!-- replace tree scale operator with more efficient BICESPS operators. <operator id='$(m)TreeScaler.t:$(n)' spec='BactrianScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.1" weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> --> <operator id="$(m)TreeScaler.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.UpDownOperator" up="@Tree.t:$(n)" weight="4.0" scaleFactor="0.1"/> <operator id='$(m)TreeRootScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.1" weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)" rootOnly='true'/> <operator id='$(m)UniformOperator.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianNodeOperator' weight="30" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='$(m)SubtreeSlide.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.evolution.operator.kernel.BactrianSubtreeSlide' weight="15" size="1.0" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='$(m)Narrow.t:$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='true' weight="15" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='$(m)Wide.t:$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='false' weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='$(m)WilsonBalding.t:$(n)' spec='WilsonBalding' weight="3" tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/>
Scale internal nodes for tree t:$(n) Scales root node for tree t:$(n) Draws new internal node heights uniformally for tree t:$(n) Performs subtree slide rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Narrow exchange performs local rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Wide exchange performs global rearrangement of tree t:$(n) Performs Wilson-Balding global rearrangement of tree t:$(n)

mergewith.subtemplate:
<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.speciation.YuleModel' id="YuleModel.t:$(n)" tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'> <parameter name='birthDiffRate' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" id="birthRate.t:$(n)" value='1.0'/> </plugin>
<distribution id='YuleBirthRatePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@birthRate.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<scale id='YuleBirthRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@birthRate.t:$(n)"/>
Yule speciation prior on tree t:$(n)
Yule speciation process birth rate of partition t:$(n)
Scale birth rate of Yule prior of tree t:$(n)

<plugin spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.speciation.CalibratedYuleModel' id="CalibratedYuleModel.t:$(n)" tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'> <parameter name='birthRate' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" id="birthRateY.t:$(n)" value='1.0'/> </plugin>
<distribution id='CalibratedYuleBirthRatePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@birthRateY.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<scale id='CalibratedYuleBirthRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@birthRateY.t:$(n)"/>
Calibrated Yule speciation prior on tree t:$(n)
Calibrated Yule speciation process birth rate for t:$(n)
Scale birth rate of Calibrated Yule prior of tree t:$(n)

<distribution id="BirthDeath.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model" tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'> <birthDiffRate spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" id="BDBirthRate.t:$(n)" value='1' /> <relativeDeathRate spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="UnitInterval" id="BDDeathRate.t:$(n)" value='0.5'/> </distribution>
<distribution id='BirthRatePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@BDBirthRate.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution> <distribution id='DeathRatePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Beta' param='@BDDeathRate.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> <beta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<scale id='BirthRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@BDBirthRate.t:$(n)"/> <scale id='DeathRateScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@BDDeathRate.t:$(n)"/>
Birth-Death speciation prior on tree t:$(n)
Birth-Death speciation process rate of partition t:$(n)
Death/Birth speciation process relative death rate of partition t:$(n)
Scale Death-Birth rate of Yule prior of tree t:$(n)
Scale Death/Birth rate of Yule prior of tree t:$(n)

<distribution id="CoalescentConstant.t:$(n)" spec="Coalescent"> <treeIntervals spec='beast.base.evolution.tree.TreeIntervals' id='TreeIntervals.t:$(n)' tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'/> <populationModel spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.tree.coalescent.ConstantPopulation" id='ConstantPopulation.t:$(n)'> <parameter name="popSize" id="popSize.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value='0.3' estimate='true'/> </populationModel> </distribution>
<operator id='PopSizeScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@popSize.t:$(n)"/>
<distribution id='PopSizePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@popSize.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
Coalescent prior with constant rate on tree t:$(n)
Coalescent population size parameter of partition t:$(n)
Scale population size of Coalescent prior of tree t:$(n)

<distribution id="CoalescentExponential.t:$(n)" spec="Coalescent"> <treeIntervals spec='beast.base.evolution.tree.TreeIntervals' id='TreeIntervals.t:$(n)' tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'/> <populationModel spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.tree.coalescent.ExponentialGrowth" id="ExponentialGrowth.t:$(n)"> <parameter name="popSize" id="ePopSize.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value='0.3' estimate='true'/> <parameter name="growthRate" id="growthRate.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value='3e-4' estimate='true'/> </populationModel> </distribution>
<operator id='ePopSizeScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@ePopSize.t:$(n)"/>
<operator id="GrowthRateRandomWalk.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.RealRandomWalkOperator" scaleFactor='0.1' weight="3" scalar="@growthRate.t:$(n)"/>
<distribution id='ePopSizePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@ePopSize.t:$(n)' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<distribution id='GrowthRatePrior.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Laplace' param='@growthRate.t:$(n)' > <mu spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.001" estimate="false"/> <scale spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="0.5" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
Coalesenct prior with exponential rate on tree t:$(n)
Coalescent population size parameter of partition t:$(n)
Coalescent growth rate of partition t:$(n)
Scale population size of Coalescent prior of tree t:$(n)
Scale growth rate of Coalescent prior of tree t:$(n)

<distribution spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.tree.coalescent.BayesianSkyline" id='BayesianSkyline.t:$(n)'> <parameter name='popSizes' id='bPopSizes.t:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" dimension="5" value="380.0" estimate='true'/> <groupSizes spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.IntSimplexParam" domain="PositiveInt" id='bGroupSizes.t:$(n)' dimension='5' value='1' estimate='true'/> <treeIntervals spec='beast.base.evolution.tree.TreeIntervals' id='BSPTreeIntervals.t:$(n)' tree='@Tree.t:$(n)'/> </distribution>
<distribution id='MarkovChainedPopSizes.t:$(n)' spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.MarkovChainDistribution" jeffreys="true" param="@bPopSizes.t:$(n)"/>
<operator id='popSizesScaler.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="15" parameter="@bPopSizes.t:$(n)"/> <operator id='groupSizesDelta.t:$(n)' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.DeltaExchangeOperator' delta="1" weight="6" integer="true" ivparameter="@bGroupSizes.t:$(n)"/>
Coalescent with Bayesian skyline prior tree t:$(n)
Markov chained prior on population sizes of Bayesian skyline plot
Scale population size of Coalscent prior of tree t:$(n)
Exchange group sizes of Coalscent prior of tree t:$(n)

<stateNode id="indicators.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.BoolVectorParam" value="false"/> <stateNode id="populationMean.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0"/> <stateNode id="popSizes.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealVectorParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0"/>
<factor id="factor" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="1.0" estimate="false"/>
<distribution id="ExtendedBayesianSkyline.t:$(n)" spec="Coalescent"> <treeIntervals id="treeIntervals.t:$(n)" spec='beast.base.evolution.tree.TreeIntervals' tree="@Tree.t:$(n)"/> <populationModel id="scaledDemo.t:$(n)" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.tree.coalescent.ScaledPopulationFunction" factor='@factor' population='@demographic.alltrees'/> </distribution>
<population id="demographic.alltrees" populationIndicators="@indicators.alltrees" populationSizes="@popSizes.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.tree.coalescent.CompoundPopulationFunction" type="linear" useIntervalsMiddle="false"> <itree idref="treeIntervals.t:$(n)"/> </population>
<distribution id='populationMeanPrior.alltrees' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Gamma' param='@populationMean.alltrees' > <alpha spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="Real" value="0.01" estimate="false"/> <theta spec="beast.base.spec.inference.parameter.RealScalarParam" domain="PositiveReal" value="100.0" estimate="false"/> </distribution>
<prior id="indicatorsPrior.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Prior"> <scalar arg="@indicators.alltrees" id="indsSun.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.evolution.Sum"/> <distr spec="Poisson" id='Poisson.EBSP'> <parameter name="lambda" value="0.69314718056" estimate='false'/> </distr> </prior>
<distribution id='popSizePrior.alltrees' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.IID' param='@popSizes.alltrees' > <distr id='popPriorDist.EBSP' spec='beast.base.spec.inference.distribution.Exponential' param='@populationMean.alltrees' > <mean idref="populationMean.alltrees"/> </distr> </distribution>
<logger id="EBSPLogger" fileName='EBSP.log' logEvery='5000' model="@demographic.alltrees"> <log idref='demographic.alltrees'/> </logger> <log id='sumIndicators' spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.Sum' arg='@indicators.alltrees'/>
<operator id="bitflip.alltrees" parameter="@indicators.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.BitFlipOperator" uniform="true" weight="30.0"/> <operator id="indicatorSampler.alltrees" dist="@popPriorDist.EBSP" indicators="@indicators.alltrees" spec="beast.base.spec.inference.operator.SampleOffValues" values="@popSizes.alltrees" weight="15.0"/> <operator id="indicatorScaler.alltrees" degreesOfFreedom="1" indicator="@indicators.alltrees" parameter="@popSizes.alltrees" scaleAll="false" scaleAllIndependently="false" scaleFactor="0.5" spec='beast.base.spec.inference.operator.ScaleOperator' weight="15.0"/> <operator id="EBSPupDownOperator.alltrees" scaleFactor="0.7" spec='beast.base.spec.evolution.operator.UpDownOperator' weight="5.0"> <up idref="popSizes.alltrees"/> <up idref="populationMean.alltrees"/> </operator>
Coalescent with extended Bayesian skyline prior tree t:$(n)
Extended Bayesian Skyline population prior mean of partition t:$(n)
Average number of population change points of partition t:$(n)
Extended Bayesian Skyline population prior of partition t:$(n)
EBSP bitflip operator
EBSP indicator sampler
EBSP population sizes
Up/down scale substitution rates of EBSP prior and tree
